generic-plugin.name: SimpleReportGenericPlugin
generic-plugin.description: A generic plugin that periodically dumps simple reports. The reports contain RHQ data.
generic-plugin.serverplugin:help: This is a sample server plugin that will periodically dump reports on RHQ data on the local filesystem.

c:simple-property.name: enabled
c:simple-property.description: Whether or not the reports should be generated

c:simple-property.name: scheduleType
c:simple-property.description: Indicates when the reports should be generated

c:simple-property.name: scheduleTrigger
c:simple-property.description: Based on the schedule type, this is either the period, in milliseconds, or the cron expression to say when the reports should be generated

c:simple-property.name: showPlatforms
c:simple-property.description: Whether or not the reports contain platform data

c:simple-property.name: showServers
c:simple-property.description: Whether or not the reports contain server data

c:simple-property.name: showServices
c:simple-property.description: Whether or not the reports contain service data

c:simple-property.name: reportDirectory
c:simple-property.description: The absolute pathname of the directory where the reports are stored.

c:simple-property.name: reportHeader
c:simple-property.description: If specified, this string will appear at the top of the report.
